parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A unique name for the recipe. Valid characters are alphanumeric (A-Z, a-z, 0-9), hyphen (-), period (.), and space.

parameters.name: Steps
parameters.description: An array containing the steps to be performed by the recipe. Each recipe step consists of one recipe action and (optionally) an array of condition expressions. (dict) --- Represents a single step from a DataBrew recipe to be performed. The particular action to be performed in the recipe step. The name of a valid DataBrew transformation to be performed on the data. Parameters (dict) --- Contextual parameters for the transformation. (string) --- (string) --- ConditionExpressions (list) --- One or more conditions that must be met for the recipe step to succeed. (dict) --- Represents an individual condition that evaluates to true or false. Conditions are used with recipe actions. The action is only performed for column values where the condition evaluates to true. If a recipe requires more than one condition, then the recipe must specify multiple ConditionExpression elements. Each condition is applied to the rows in a dataset first, before the recipe action is performed. A specific condition to apply to a recipe action. For more information, see Recipe structure in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide. Value (string) --- A value that the condition must evaluate to for the condition to succeed. A column to apply this condition to.

nested_params.name: Action
nested_params.description: The particular action to be performed in the recipe step.

nested_params.name: Operation
nested_params.description: The name of a valid DataBrew transformation to be performed on the data.

nested_params.name: ConditionExpressions
nested_params.description: One or more conditions that must be met for the recipe step to succeed.

nested_params.name: Condition
nested_params.description: A specific condition to apply to a recipe action. For more information, see Recipe structure in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value that the condition must evaluate to for the condition to succeed.

nested_params.name: TargetColumn
nested_params.description: A column to apply this condition to.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Metadata tags to apply to this recipe. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the recipe that you created.
